definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 喬達虛汽車修理廠位於市郊，那裏過往車輛很多。

sentences.english: He founded in 1998 Xiaodian District essence auto repair shop.
sentences.chinese: 他於1998年創立小店區精華汽車修理廠。

sentences.english: I want to transfer the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我想轉讓這個汽車修理廠。

sentences.english: Garages should be far from the downtown.
sentences.chinese: 汽車修理廠應該遠離市區。

sentences.english: I must look into the garage on the way home to book a service for the car.
sentences.chinese: 回家時我得順路到汽車修理廠去預約檢修汽車的事情。

sentences.english: We still owe the garage for those repairs.
sentences.chinese: 我們還欠汽車修理廠的修理費。

sentences.english: When the two men arrived at Nick's they found Marty playing with some other boys.
sentences.chinese: 兩人到達尼克修理廠時，發現馬蒂正和其他男孩玩耍。

sentences.english: My car towed his car to a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我的車將他的車拖到了汽車修理廠。

sentences.english: His car is in such bad condition as to be repaired in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 他的車的車況太差，得去修理廠大修一下。

sentences.english: Garages never seemed to be open when the car broke down.
sentences.chinese: 車壞的時候，好象修理廠總是關着門。

sentences.english: I went to the garage and asked for my money back, but they refused.
sentences.chinese: 我去修理廠想把前要回來，卻被他們拒絕了。

sentences.english: The dent on the wing of our car can be beaten out at the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我們汽車擋泥板上的凹痕可以在汽車修理廠敲平。

sentences.english: And then removed the pump shaft shell removed send impeller repair shop repair.
sentences.chinese: 然後將軸拆出泵殼，拆下葉輪送修理廠修理。

sentences.english: Weber is working in a garage as a mechanician .
sentences.chinese: 韋伯在汽車修理廠作機械師。

sentences.english: A tractor towed the car to the repair factory.
sentences.chinese: 一輛牽引車將汽車拖去修理廠。

definition: lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)

Feast at Hongmen/(fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest/refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3]
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
on call/always available/ready at all times
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
